job description:
Data Engineer

Position Summary

Responsible for design, analysis, evaluation, testing, debugging and implementation of data, metrics, and analytics pipeline.

Duties
  • Build positive and effective working relationship with the Product Team, Project Management and Development teams. The end result being to deliver solutions that meet the expectations of our Customers.
  • Experience with Business Intelligence / Data Warehouse components including source data analysis, ETL, ODS, Data Lakes, Data Marts, Reporting, Dashboards, and Analytics.
  • Exceptional problem-solving ability and a positive attitude.
Other Responsibilities
  • Architect and design analytic solutions that deliver business value.
  • Implement software solutions according to design and business requirements on complex development efforts.
  • Perform data profiling and analysis.
  • Assist in creating documentation and training materials to familiarize other team members with the given system and help educate non-technical staff.
  • Refine and automate regular processes, track issues, and manage change though the production environment.
  • Experience with performance tuning and troubleshooting.
  • Excellent oral and written communications skills.
  • Intellectual Curiosity: Exploring new territories and finding creative and unusual ways to solve problems.
Education, Experience, Certification Requirements
  • Bachelor’ s degree in Computer Science or Data Science or equivalent work experience
  • 3-5 years of relevant experience
Core Skills and Abilities
  • Implementation experience deploying and supporting AWS solutions.
  • Development experience with: Python (PySpark), SQL (standard ANSI, as well as Presto nuances preferred)
  • End-to-end experience with file based and relational data management solutions - including experience with data modeling and data reporting in both data management paradigms.
Desirable Skills and Abilities
  • Experience optimizing code for performance.
  • Experience with Segment.com Analytics.
  • Experience in the media/broadcast/video industry.
  • Able to work independently or in a team environment. Develop strong working relationships with internal customers and peer IT team members.
  • Ability to learn new software and hardware systems quickly.
